publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2698# Mr Gil Paterson: Child Witness Reform—That the Parliament welcomes the report Justice for Children – The Welfare of Children in the Justice System; commends Children 1st, Childline, NCH Scotland and the other participants for producing this report, and considers that the Scottish Executive should look closely at the findings and recommendations of the report and act accordingly.
S1M-2698# Child Witness Reform (lodged on 5 February 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*, Fergus Ewing*, Stewart Stevenson*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr John McAllion*
S1M-2698# Child Witness Reform (lodged on 5 February 2002) Nora Radcliffe*, Scott Barrie*, Michael Matheson*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*

S1M-2698# Mr Gil Paterson: Child Witness Reform—That the Parliament welcomes the report Justice for Children – The Welfare of Children in the Justice System; commends Children 1st, Childline, NCH Scotland and the other participants for producing this report, and considers that the Scottish Executive should look closely at the findings and recommendations of the report and act accordingly. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Fergus Ewing, Stewart Stevenson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Mr John McAllion, Nora Radcliffe, Scott Barrie, Michael Matheson, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2698# Child Witness Reform (lodged on 5 February 2002) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Karen Whitefield*
S1M-2698# Child Witness Reform (lodged on 5 February 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Maureen Macmillan*, Kay Ullrich*, Michael Russell*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2698# Child Witness Reform (lodged on 5 February 2002) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-2698# Child Witness Reform (lodged on 5 February 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-2698# Child Witness Reform (lodged on 5 February 2002) Elaine Smith*
S1M-2698# Child Witness Reform (lodged on 5 February 2002) Alex Neil*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-2698# Child Witness Reform (lodged on 5 February 2002) Cathy Peattie*
